title: Gorgeous Home on Garden Block
description: Madison Square is a unique and historically certified garden block in the desirable Graduate Hospital area of Philadelphia. Just a few steps from South Street and a quick walk to Rittenhouse Square, this well kept home is both beautiful and conveniently located. Unlike Philly’s traditional narrow rowhomes, this house features a wide center hall layout with a living room to the right and a dining room to the left. Bask in gorgeous original details like high ceilings, built ins, decorative moldings, and hard wood floors while also enjoying modern comforts like brand new double paned energy efficient windows. Through the dining room, you’ll find an eat in kitchen with a brand new extra large Samsung 28cu french door fridge, a newer Bosch dishwasher and a GE profile gas range with double oven. The kitchen leads out to a private patio and down to a large basement with washer and dryer. Upstairs you will find 3 bedrooms and a gorgeously renovated bathroom, compete with a rain shower, just finished in January 2023! If you are looking for a special rental with loads of character in one of the most desirable and convenient areas in the city, then you have found it!	https://matrix.brightmls.com/matrix/shared/t5HxHsQBwbd/2308MadisonSQUARE

title: Looking for a roommate! Can be temp:)
description:
Hi! I'm looking into subletting a room in a two bedroom condo in West Chester, PA. It is close to the 104 bus line that takes you right into West Chester, about 7-10 mins! It has a big yard behind the building where you will often see other residents in the area walking their dogs and enjoying the sunshine (when the weather is nice ofc!). The condo has an in unit laundry, with a little balcony. Overall the area is very lovely and is located in a nice neighborhood!
Rent is $800 a month and electric would be split between the both of us!
A little about myself, I just moved to the East coast a few months ago. I have two cats that will be on the property, both shy at first but eventually warm up!:) I love to dance, read, cook (I'm vegan so I'm always trying new recipes), karaoke, going out for walks, and trying new things! I'm a 24 year old working professional (I work as a paralegal) so ideally someone that is a young professional too! I'm non-binary (elle, they, them)-- I welcome any gender identity to sublet the room too, just want someone who is respectful! Please feel free to email me for more details :)
**Note there is no attached garage parking, I couldn't select another option. There is parking in the parking lot that is located just outside the building! No extra charge for parking.

title: Completely renovated 2bd/1bth House for rent
description: Completely renovated townhouse located in Downtown Conshohocken. Walking distance to public transportation and all that Conshohocken has to offer with shops, restaurants, etc. Step into what feels like a brand new house, that includes brand new floors, kitchen cabinets, countertops, appliances, California closets, recessed lighting, and mini splits added for extra comfort during the summer time. When you walk into this house you're greeted with fresh paint throughout and have a very open Living Room & Dining Room off of the Kitchen. You're also able to access the very large basement which is perfect for storage and your laundry needs. Kitchen has also been completely renovated and includes a brand new wine fridge. Eat-in Kitchen has new tile, countertops, cabinets, and appliances. Ample counter and cabinet space to ensure that storage space isn't an issue. Rear door off of Kitchen leads to fully fenced backyard and a rear deck. Perfect sized yard for your fur baby or play area for your kiddos. Second floor consists of two spacious bedrooms that are split with an open study in between and a new full bathroom. Both bedrooms are very spacious and have new mini ducts, recessed lighting, and built-in California closet organizers. This home was designed to maximum the entire space/storage available. Radiator covers to be installed throughout the home & a cabinet for the wine fridge in the Kitchen is also being installed. Nest doorbell to be installed for "peace of mind."

title: Welcome to 530 S 2nd St Fully Furnished Condo in Beautiful Condition!
description:
Welcome to 530 South 2nd Street, Unit 819 a fully furnished condo in beautiful condition! Walk into a newly renovated open concept kitchen, finished with new hardware and cabinetry designed for maximum storage. The kitchen is also equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a spacious peninsula, perfect for dining and entertaining. Continue into the airy living room where you will find ample space for lounging on the couch or working at the newly custom built-in desk. The couch easily turns into a queen-size sleeper sofa, ideal for hosting friends or family overnight! Off the living room you will find the bedroom, recently fitted with new windows and stylish, yet practical, plantation shutters. The master closet was recently transformed into the ultimate dream closet! Designed by California Closets, no expense was spared to ensure that you will have more than enough space for your wardrobe. Also, off the living room you will find the bathroom with beautiful stone tile throughout, generous storage space, and a shower/tub completed with bath jets. Here you will also find your very own washer and dryer. Not only is the inside of this unit amazing, but the private covered balcony offering picturesque views of the city provides the perfect combination of indoor-outdoor living. This unit comes fully furnished, with all the furniture being in excellent condition. Also included is complete access to the gym in the building, an outdoor garden with seating, 24/7 security, and access to a covered parking garage with the option to rent a parking space. Located in the historic area of Society Hill, this unit is surrounded by charm and beauty. You also can't beat the convenience of being only steps away from award-winning restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries, and more. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!!
description:
** 2 Car PARKING ** This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!! It is the premier unit in the Candy Factory Lofts. Light floods in the large and many windows at every time of day. The kitchen, dining area, and living room comprise the very large open floor plan with 14 ft. ceilings. The designer kitchen has stainless cabinets, granite countertops, and maple floors running throughout. The very large master bedroom has a walk-in closet. The second bedroom is also plenty of roomy. The bathroom is smartly designed to function as a full bathroom but can be sectioned off by a sliding door to make it a powder room, a great feature for entertaining. This is only one of 2 units in the building that has its own private deck. It is accessed by a spiral stair in the living room area. The unobstructed deck views go for miles in every direction. There is a large coat closet/storage closet that also houses the laundry room just off the front hallway. The 2 Car PARKING is covered and gated!!! Common bike storage on the first floor. A short walk/ride takes you to all of Fishtown's new restaurants and shops. Easy walk to the Market-Frankford El and the trolley.
1125 E Columbia Ave #301

title: Fully renovated in Washington Sq west with 3 stories plus a basement!
description:
Welcome to 1026 Irving St, an historic end of row townhouse that has just been fully renovated in Washington Square west with 3 stories plus a finished basement. The home is 875 SF above grade finished and 351 SF below grade finished for a total of 1,226 SF. On the first floor you will find a living room area, an updated kitchen with new appliances, breakfast peninsula, new cabinets and solid surface countertops. Off of the kitchen is a nice size outdoor patio area, perfect for grilling. In the full finished basement is another den/ living area with a bar area, a half bath and laundry room. The second level has a large master suite with an en-suite bathroom and walk in closet. The third level has an open loft space which is perfect for that work from office space. New LVP flooring throughout the whole house. Close to bike routes, public transportation including Patco, the broad street line, and many major bus routes. The walk score is 99 and the transit score is 100. Walking distance to Jefferson University campus and many great shops and restaurants. Don't miss out on this one. It won't last long.
1026 Irving St

title: Brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia!
description:
Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia! This unit sits on the top floor of a beautifully restored carriage house. It is a stunning blend of industrial charm and modern sophistication. The spacious open-concept living space boasts vaulted exposed timber ceilings, large windows custom Anderson windows, and beautifully exposed brick walls that add character and warmth. The designer kitchen includes matte black cabinetry, a Samsung appliance package, and an oversized island with natural stone counters and backsplash! Perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying a meal at home. The living room is spacious, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the large windows, creating a bright and airy environment, coupled with exposed duct work running the length of the unit. Access control is through a Latch system, with full and total control via your mobile phone. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Spring Arts, the property is located within walking distance to a brand new full-sized Giant grocer, gyms, cafes, hot new restaurants/bars, and concert venues! This is a quick walk to La Chinesca, Café Lift, Yards Brewery, Love City Brewery, Triple Bottom Brewery, Lucky Well, Juno, Reading Terminal, the newly built rail park, and many many more great establishments/destinations!
1233 Hamilton St #2

Lovely one bedroom unit in sought after Queen Village. This quaint, self managed and well maintained unit and building has a spacious, shared, gated courtyard space. This unit offers a nice sized living area with hardwood floors, exposed brick, recessed lighting and a ceiling fan, a fully-equipped updated kitchen with tile backsplash, granite countertops, and breakfast bar, a full updated bath with built-in shelving a shower/tub combination, and a sizeable bedroom in the rear. There is central air, good closet space, an in-unit washer/dryer, newer HVAC system and trash and snow removal services. The location is awesome, close to popular Philadelphia Java Company, For Pete’s Sake Pub, Lucky’s Last Chance, Headhouse Salon, and green spaces such as Mario Lanza Park, and Shot Tower Recreation Center. Center City and 95 are both extremely accessible to this area. Don’t miss out on this opportunity!

title: Renovated 1-Bedroom, 1-Bath at Independence Place on Washington Square
description:
Renovated 1-Bedroom, 1-Bath at Independence Place on Washington Square. Freshly painted, Turn-key and Move-In ready! Hardwood floors welcome into Entry Foyer with large Coat Closet and open floor plan. NEW White Calcutta Quartz Kitchen countertops, NEW Stainless Steel Sink, NEW Stainless Steel GE Range, NEW Stainless Steel GE Microwave. White Kitchen with Soft-close Cabinetry, Contemporary Stainless Steel Cabinetry Pulls, Dishwasher, Fridge, Garbage Disposal and open Peninsula with floor to ceiling Built-Ins make the layout perfect for entertaining and for easy living. The spacious bedroom has a desk area and large Walk-In Closet, plus an additional spacious Wall Closet. The floor-to-ceiling glass windows provide Southern exposure. Simple yet sophisticated updated Full Bathroom has Grey/White Marble countertop and Stainless Steel Faucets. Washer and Dryer in unit and there is a separate Linen Closet as well. 24-hour Doorman, Concierge, On-site Maintenance and an elegant new Lobby and state-of-the art Fitness Center that is planned to open this year in 2023, make Independence Place a very well-run luxury Condominium residence located on Washington Square park with high-end restaurants, shopping, beauty salon and Philadelphia’s Historic landmarks, all within an easy walk. Parking is available underground in the Condominium’s garage for an additional cost.

title: Private Furnished Bedroom For 1 Person on Quiet Ardmore Street
description:
A charming residence in popular Ardmore Park, this beautiful Cape Cod twin is ideally situated in the heart of a quiet street, with a room becoming available to rent on March 1, 2022. I am looking for a reliable tenant to rent out the middle bedroom of my 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom Ardmore home located on a quiet but wonderfully walkable street only 6 blocks to town center with easy driveway and street parking. (1 person only, no couples or pets due to local occupancy laws and housemate pet allergy). The house and room are already fully furnished. The bedroom has a queen bed and 2 dressers. The living room features leather couch, large marble tables and a 65 inch TV. The kitchen features a Hitchcock kitchen table, stove, refrigerator, garbage disposal and dish washer. Your lease includes use of a washer and dryer unit in the basement. I have bedroom furniture available if you need it as well.
There is one full bathroom upstairs and one downstairs. The middle bedroom is 110 square feet and includes a closet. The two other tenants you would be living with are: (James (32), an EMT Haverford College grad Class of 2012 and Suli (34), a server at Teca. Utilities (electric, gas, water and internet) are split evenly between the three tenants (relatively low due to the home's newer efficient boiler, insulation throughout, brand new Marvin Elevate fiberglass windows and a brand-new Provia Signet fiberglass front entry door). There is a nice private back yard and large deck. Parking is never an issue with the home's long driveway and plenty of off-street parking. The street itself is very pleasant, scenic and quiet, mostly populated by families and young couples. Having a few guests over for dinner is fine but wild house parties certainly are not allowed, and so are significant others that are “always there” (guests allowed overnight max 5 nights/month unless permitted by other tenants). Because the house is occupied by courteous roommates and surrounded by families, drunken loud-at-2AM party people need not apply! The house is kept reasonably clean (but not to the point of total neat freak) so we need someone who is willing to do their fair share of the cleaning on a regular basis. Tenants also responsible for shoveling snow and are expected to do their part to keep the driveway and walkways clear. The location of the home is excellent with everything the prestigious Ardmore, Main Line and Lower Merion area has to offer. Living in this home, you can enjoy a short 7-block walk to the train station where you can get into center city in less than 20 minutes. The majority of the town's shopping, nightlife and restaurants are less than a mile away, featuring Suburban Square (7 blocks), Carlino's Specialty Italian Foods (3 blocks), Tired Hands Brewery (8 blocks) and the great township parks. The home boasts a great central location, with an easy commute to: Center City Philadelphia: 10 miles, (Manayunk /Roxborough:5 miles) (Villanova University: 4 miles) (Saint Joes, Wynnewood Bala Cynwyd: 4 Miles) (Cabrini & Eastern: 6 miles) (Bryn Mawr and Haverford College: 2miles) (Radnor: 6 miles) (Wayne: 7 Miles) (Devon: 9 miles) (Berwyn: 10 miles) (Paoli and Malvern: 12 miles) (Havertown: 1 Mile) (West Chester: 18 miles) (King of Prussia: 10 miles)
MONTHLY ROOM PRICE = $699 + 1/3 utilities
*Minimum 3-Month lease required, along with first/last month’s rent and a security deposit equal to one month's rent. Annual rent increase will never exceed the rate of inflation (CPI).
$2,097 = Initial Payment/Room Deposit = First and Last month's rent + $699 security deposit. ( $699+ $699 + $699)
Professionals: Another benefit to living in Ardmore is that there is NO LOCAL WAGE TAX.
Please send an email for further inquiry.
PLEASE NOTE: All those wishing to apply after viewing the property must pass a check of their credit, proof of income, criminal background and eviction history, just as past tenants have. After you pay the application fee ($35), your keys will be given to you once the initial payment is received and processed.

Designed by our in-house Studio team for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage. Right outside your door, you'll find beautiful amenities, including a second floor lounge/coworking space and an expansive rooftop deck.

You may gaze upon skyscrapers such as BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as March 20, 2023!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Sue's Produce Market, and Venditore by Giordano. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Schlesinger's, P.S. & Co., Tequilas Restaurant & Bar, Max Brenner, Ocean Prime, Harp & Crown, Oyster House, Pietro's, a.kitchen, Scarpetta, The Dandelion, Veda, The Continental Mid-town, Village Whiskey, Wilder Restaurant, Pizzeria Vetri, Spice Finch, and Friday Saturday Sunday. Relax with a manicure at Fleur d'Or Nail Bar & Art. This building is close to the theaters on the Avenue of the Arts. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!

title: On site washer and dryer, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Professional on-site management team
-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge
-Seasonal Bike Share Program
-New fitness center
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available
-Smoke-free apartments available
-Elevator building
-On site washer and dryer

title: ***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.***
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304

title: Renovated One Bedroom w/ Free Month Special
description:
Welcome to Drexelbrook, where quality and comfort meet. We are one of the largest garden type apartment communities in the Philadelphia vicinity. Established in 1948, Drexelbrook enjoys a reputation of excellence in our community. Situated on 134 acres in the Drexel Hill section of Delaware County, Drexelbrook encompasses 1223 one, two and three bedroom apartments spread over 90 federal style buildings. The building types include Walk-Up, Courtyard and Town Houses. The buildings are a desirable two-story layout. Some of our distinctive amenities include:
Parking, On and off-Street
Garages available
High speed internet access
Three On-site Playgrounds
Fitness Center
On-site management
On-site maintenance
24 hour emergency maintenance
overnight security
Central Air conditioning
Storage space
Day-care
Public transportation
Drexelbrook is the smart choice for those looking for a quiet and centrally located place to live. Easy access to Philadelphia, Media, King of Prussia and Delaware via public transportation, driving via US 1, I-476 (Blue Route), I-95 and the I-76. The Blue Route (I-476) is approximately 2.2 miles from Drexelbrook
A Private Residential Community

Drexel Hill, PA 19026

title: Upgraded 2 Bedroom *Free Month Special
description:
Welcome to Drexelbrook, where quality and comfort meet. We are one of the largest garden type apartment communities in the Philadelphia vicinity. Established in 1948, Drexelbrook enjoys a reputation of excellence in our community. Situated on 134 acres in the Drexel Hill section of Delaware County, Drexelbrook encompasses 1223 one, two and three bedroom apartments spread over 90 federal style buildings. The building types include Walk-Up, Courtyard and Town Houses. The buildings are a desirable two-story layout. Some of our distinctive amenities include:
Parking, On and Off-Street
Garages available
High speed internet access
Three On-site Playgrounds
Fitness Center
On-site management
On-site maintenance
24 hour emergency maintenance
overnight security
Central Air conditioning
Storage space
Day-care
Public transportation
Drexelbrook is the smart choice for those looking for a quiet and centrally located place to live. Easy access to Philadelphia, Media, King of Prussia and Delaware via public transportation, driving via US 1, I-476 (Blue Route), I-95 and the I-76. The Blue Route (I-476) is approximately 2.2 miles from Drexelbrook
A Private Residential Community
4812 Drexelbrook Drive
Drexel Hill, PA 19026
